sets.description: Increase final damage by **12%/15%/18%/21%**. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect. The number of sparrowfeathers that can be obtained per dodge is increased to **20**.

When equipped with at least **1** flame weapon, increase elemental damage by **28%/32%/36%/40%**. After using **Pine Comet's** 'Four-Way Sparrow', increase elemental damage by an additional **15%**, where this additional increase in damage will gradually decrease to **10%** over the span of **25** seconds.
